strapiPost.title: Get A Head Start Planning Your 2023 Razorback Football Season
strapiPost.content:
The SEC released the 2023 Arkansas football schedule yesterday, giving fans a chance to start their fall 2023 weekend planning.

  • At home: The Hogs will host seven in-state home games during the 2023 season with the season opener against Western Carolina on Sept. 2 at War Memorial Stadium in Little Rock.
  • Away: The Razorbacks will face on the road challenges at LSU, Ole Miss, Alabama, and Florida as well as squaring off with A&M at AT&T Stadium in Arlington on Sept. 30, 2023 (ideally, for a third win in a row after this weekend).

Check out the full schedule HERE.
